fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Investigate (Night): Investigate a player to figure out what letter their role begins with.
-Deduce (Day): Guess a letter. At the beginning of the night, all Unseen will know how many of roles begin with that letter that are alive, and how theyâ€™re distributed between factions. 2 uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: Deduce cannot be affected by frames.
